divs: Sighting DetailsI was flying to my sisters in Atlanta, Georgia for Thanksgiving Dec 19th 2011. As we were half way into the flight, aprox 11am to 12 noon, I looked out the window and observed a cigar shaped object that was aprox 5 to 8 miles away & seemed to be aprox 3 to 4 football fields long, silver outer shaped along with darker features inside of the shape. I rubbed my eyes, kept seeing it for 5 seconds, then I turned to the man sitting next to me and said "look, do you see that"? He looked out and said no! As I looked back out, it was gone!I was jut relaxing at the time, just looking out the window from time to time,It was so large, that's why I noticed it. I know when I saw it it was not of this world as I was in the U.S. Navy & worked on Aircraft & worked for the DOD and Government Contractors! It was stationary didn't seem to move. I was excited! and nervous!Lost sight when I turned to the man in the seat next to me. I really hope someone else reported the same type of object on the same day, time, and location. please direct me where to go to find out that info, thank you!
Summary: I flew to Atlanta Airport from Los Angeles, aprox half way there I looked out the window & observed a cigar shaped object
